summary: This document is an email exchange between Audrey Strauss and an unnamed recipient, likely a prosecutor or team member, regarding the Maxwell and Epstein cases. It discusses preparation for an upcoming bail hearing and expresses gratitude for support from the Office.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Sender and recipient of emails; appears to be a supervising attorney expressing support and anticipation for an upcoming bail hearing in the Maxwell and Epstein cases.

events.title: Email exchange regarding bail hearing
events.description: Audrey Strauss and an unnamed recipient discuss preparation for an upcoming bail hearing in the Maxwell and Epstein cases, with Strauss expressing confidence in the recipient's work.

keyFacts: The email exchange is dated July 10, 2020, and references ongoing work on the Maxwell and Epstein cases.
It mentions preparation for a bail hearing, described as 'the most popular bail hearing ever held,' indicating high public or media interest.
The unnamed recipient expresses gratitude for the Office's support in seeking justice in the cases.
